<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Azure VM">42bdce21878a7050669e63d73cbb3528</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c6bd4661878a7050669e63d73cbb350b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>PopulateAzureVMInputs_2</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var rowObj = [];
	rowObj.push({
		"input_name": 'size',
		"input_description": '',
		"input_type": 'string',
		"input_value": g_form.getValue('size')

	});
	rowObj.push({
		"input_name": 'location',
		"input_description": '',
		"input_type": 'string',
		"input_value": g_form.getValue('location')

	});
	g_form.setValue('inputs', JSON.stringify(rowObj));	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-18 11:47:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>12bd4661878a7050669e63d73cbb355e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PopulateAzureVMInputs_2</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cloudify" source="x_607849_cloudify">0168d8a42f132010499fff1df699b635</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cloudify">0168d8a42f132010499fff1df699b635</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_12bd4661878a7050669e63d73cbb355e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-18 11:47:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
